name: Cold Blue Mountain - S/T
description: GOG-003. 12" record, 33⅓ rpm. Pressing limited to 300. 200 black vinyl, 100 blue/white split (band-only). "Cold Blue Mountain is a band who deserves your attention now. The album is a masterclass on how to blend different genres and moods to brilliant effect. The songs have the perfect balance of Sludge, Stoner, Doom and Post-Metal riffs blended together, which is a very hard thing to pull off. However, Cold Blue Mountain have succeeded on every level." - Sludgelord Side I 1. Branch Davidian Compound 2. Time Flies Like an Arrow 3. PTSD 4. Dark Secret Side II 5. MK Ultra 6. White North 7. Lone Pine 8. Comatose 9. MK Outro Includes a download code for a digital version of the record. In stock for immediate shipping.

name: Kingsblood - Trudging Through the Field of Crows
description: GOG-002. 7" record, 33⅓ rpm. Features brand new tracks "Hordes of the Night" and "The Howl." Pressing of 300: 100 "dragon blood" vinyl 100 opaque red vinyl 100 opaque red base swirled with black vinyl Includes a download code for a digital version of the record. In stock for immediate shipping.

name: Fister - VIOLENCE
description: GOG-001. 10" record, 33⅓ rpm. First pressing of 500 total. Choose from: I: Artwork by Coby Ellison. Lavender base with black and white mixed vinyl, limited to 100. II: Artwork by Clark Medley. Opaque white base with black mixed vinyl, limited to 100. III: Artwork by Travis Lawrence. Translucent green base with yellow mixed vinyl, limited to 100. IV: Artwork by Scott Fogelbach. Transparent dark red base with black mixed vinyl, limited to 100. V: Artwork by Josh Rowan. Transparent blue base with black and white mixed vinyl, limited to 100. “uber-miserable, crushing, heavy doom … this will almost certainly be your cup of strong, horrible tea” – The Sleeping Shaman “A quality product at a budget price indicates a focus on the fans and the music itself … I’m thoroughly impressed with Fister’s latest vinyl and hope to see them work with Gogmagogical Records in the future … I scooped up all five and immediately loved the splash of color and unique cover art exclusive to each variation” – The Metal Advisor “[Fister are] insane when it comes to packaging, and their latest release is the culmination of years of vinyl nerdery and aesthetic obsession … the overall package is just beautiful” – MetalSucks “A monster release which is splendid-looking and kickass music-wise … this vinyl re-release of Violence is classy indeed” – Doommantia “it’s heavier than a herd of elephants riding a gam of whales … Fister don’t mess about when it comes to pounding your head with slow megaton riffs and the loud beat of the drums” – We Must Obey Includes a download code for a digital version of the record. Note: the music content is the same on each variant. In stock for immediate shipping.

options.name: I: Lavender base with black and white mixed vinyl
II: Opaque white base with black mixed vinyl
III: Translucent green base with yellow mixed vinyl
IV: Transparent dark red base with black mixed vinyl
V: Transparent blue base with black and white mixed vinyl

name: Exclusive Fister VIOLENCE Tee
description:
From the legendary Holy Mountain, features the original VIOLENCE artwork on front, "You've Run Too Far, You Belong to Us" along with the Gogmagogical Records logo on the rear.

Fruit of the Loom tee, 100% Cotton.

In stock for immediate shipping.

name: Record Bag
description:
Tote your Tremendous Music. Just lift with your knees. 15.5"x15"

Add to your order for free when buying two or more items - just use discount code FREETOTE.

name: Cold Blue Mountain Tee
description:
Another fantastic tee from Holy Mountain. Features original artwork by Matt Loomis on front, the Gogmagogical Records logo on the rear.

Gildan tee, 100% Cotton.

In stock for immediate shipping.

name: Fister - The Infernal Paramount
description: 2nd Pressing from Holy Mountain Music features new artwork from Coby Ellison. Hand-numbered limited edition of 100. 150g vinyl, 45 rpm. Plays from the inside-out. Side 1: Deaf Wish River Coffins Side 2: Aemeth etching Includes a download code for a digital version of the record. In stock for immediate shipping.

name: Cara Neir - Portals to a Better, Dead World
description: From Halo of Flies (HALO62) and Broken Limbs Recordings (BLR021) Texas duo Cara Neir return with "Portals to a Better, Dead World", their first full length to appear on vinyl. Fans of the band won't be disappointed as it's Cara Neir at their best. "Portals..." is full of instantly catchy songs and ferocious riffs. "The fact that a band can bring together so many different sounds and still sound cohesive is a laudable feat." - The Inarguable 500 12" copies of "Portals..." were pressed. 100 on smoke green and 400 on black vinyl. Included are an insert, download code and full color jacket with art by Nate Burns of Vit. Insert art created by Lucy Boyakhandjyan. These copies are black vinyl Released 31, October 2013

name: Fister - Gemini
description: Compact Disc from Pissfork Anticulture: 6 panel digipak with over 46 minutes of depressingly heavy tunes. TRACK LISTING: Antitheist Suicide Hessian III Gemini Sinking Estonia Permanent Chemical Psychosis Invisible Corpse In stock for immediate shipping.

name: Momentum - Herbivore
description:
ONE COPY REMAINING!

From Halo of Flies (HALO53)

“It comes as no surprise when a hardcore and/or punk-rock band delve into political territory, especially when so much of the early scene was based around a movement expressing a disdain for politics and the like. Even to this day, much hasn’t changed within the scene – bands continue to express themselves musically with strong views and emotions that convey a message – in hopes of opening eyes and minds to the troubles of the world. Momentum, a side-project featuring members of Plague Mass, Light Bearer and XZieglerX – who play heavy, epic and melodically driven DIY hardcore-punk, which is both crushing and uplifting – showcase not only their passion for playing fast, politically-charged music, but deliver a strong message that hits just as hard as the music.
Unlike their previous album Whetting Occam’s Razor (highly recommended) – in which they were influenced by the words of Carl Sagan and other luminary thinkers – on Herbivore, the band’s second and final album, they shift their focus on animal rights, veganism, and the tragedies of the meat and dairy industry, which is beautifully orchestrated throughout eight tracks of pissed off and melodic hardcore.
Like any trademark staple of a hardcore/punk album, Herbivore blasts through each track with relentless pace, offering no breaks or breathers, and as the album title gently hints at, Herbivore’s general theme is that of veganism, and animal rights. With each member sharing a strong belief in these areas, they present their ideals without restraint, and the overall approach of the album – the sound, lyrics and presentation – is aggressive.” – tHE mONOLITH

500 copies – North American Pressing.
Pressed at Rainbo Records via SamoMedia
co released with Forged In Iron (Canada)
Black Vinyl
LP includes a 5x8in lyric sheet, 20pg ‘vegan zine’, and download card.
Full color matte finish covers printed at RossEllis (canada).
Inserts and zine printed at Econopress.

name: Gogmagogical Patch
description:
God don't like it. Gog does.

Cover your denim on a biblical scale. Or at least 4-3/4" x 7-1/4".

Grab it free using code GOGPATCH when buying two or more records.
